Schedule of EVENTS
Signature Event Showcase
There‚Äôs always something happening at Uptown Tavern!
We have a host of signature events you can count on for a good time throughout the year, including our famous 26.2 Foot Race, our classic Halfway to St. Patrick‚Äôs Day celebration (in addition to the big day itself), our annual Birthday Bash deck party, and our crowd-favorite Crawfish Boils on the back patio!
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container
Make your way Uptown and stop by for a visit to join in on all the fun with our themed nights and seasonal celebrations!
While you‚Äôre here, make sure to ask your bartender about paired drink specials and don‚Äôt forget to take advantage of our
extended Happy Hour
! Try out our 22oz Irish Pounder draft and score more with a larger pour, or join us for a
Pitcher Night
or
Dollar Night
to keep the tap flowing all night long!
UPCOMING EVENTS
We have several recurring weekly events, including our famous
Wednesday Dollar Nights
,
free-play pool
on Sundays,
Tuesday night karaoke
, and fan favorites like
trivia
and
bingo
with prizes every night!
Whether you‚Äôre looking for a weekend watch party, late-night dance club, or weekday watering hole, O‚ÄôRiley‚Äôs Uptown Tavern has spaces for every occasion. Make sure to
subscribe to our newsletter
to stay up to date on it all!
Looking to add something new? Check out our
event registration
and schedule a reservation for our venue and we can work to hook up your party with food truck and drink options!

THREE DAY CELEBRATION

Monday 3/17:
The big party happens on St. Patrick‚Äôs Day itself! The party will take place throughout the bar, and into our covered patio and large backyard.

Our St. Patrick‚Äôs Day games will return with a bang! Join us during the party for a chance to win prizes and bragging rights for the year. One competition will be the

where you‚Äôll be judged on your attire and holiday spirit (and maybe your dancing skills).
